question:
International Solar Alliance:
  1. was launched at COP 16 in Cancun, Mexico
  2. will act as a common platform for cooperation between Suryaputra (Sunshine Countries) and other countries
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because ISA was launched at COP21 in Paris, France. Suryaputra (Sunshine) countries are countries lying between Tropic of cancer and Capricorn.
